title: Elijah’s Depression and God’s Whisper
summary: After the showdown at Mount Carmel, Elijah flees Jezebel’s threat. He becomes discouraged and asks God to take his life. God strengthens him, and Elijah meets Him not in wind or fire but in a gentle whisper. Elijah is told to anoint new leaders and finds Elisha to mentor.

faq.question: Why did Elijah flee into the wilderness?
faq.answer: Because Queen Jezebel threatened to kill him after Mount Carmel.

faq.question: How did God speak to Elijah?
faq.answer: Not through dramatic signs, but through a gentle whisper.
